Item ID1927

A bucket of milk is an item used primarily in Cooking. It is required in making cakes (and, by extension, chocolate cakes). It is also needed to make Choc saturdays in gnome cooking.

Players can turn a bucket of milk into chocolatey milk by adding chocolate dust, or add milk to nettle tea (though this does not add any effects). Depending on their Cooking level, Members can use a dairy churn to turn a bucket of milk into a pot of cream, a pat of butter, or a piece of cheese.

A bucket of milk can also be used to feed kittens. If fed to a hellcat, it will turn back into a normal cat.

A bucket of milk is required to make a Hangover cure during the Plague City quest and the Skippy and the Mogres miniquest. It is also needed in the Gertrude's Cat quest.

Obtaining buckets of milk[edit | edit source]

Players can use a bucket on a dairy cow to gain a bucket of milk, or simply click on the dairy cow when they have at least one empty bucket in their inventory.

Members can gain a bucket of milk from any type of larder in the kitchen of their player-owned house.

A bucket of milk spawns in a hut in the eastern part of Rellekka.

There are some food shops that sell buckets of milk:

  • Grand Tree Groceries, run by Hudo on the 1st floor[UK]2nd floor[US] of the Grand Tree (12 coins).
  • The Culinaromancer's Chest (12 coins): Stocks 5 buckets of milk per subquest of Recipe for Disaster the player has completed (up to 50 for all 10 quest parts).

Depending on their Cooking level, [[Members]] can use a [[dairy churn]] to turn a bucket of milk into a [[pot of cream]], a [[pat of butter]], or a piece of [[cheese]]. A bucket of milk can also be used to feed kittens. If fed to a [[hellcat]], it will turn back into a normal [[cat]].
